name: Nekara
title: Creation of Simulated Cognition
description: A combination of many things. She exists in many states and phases. Is she even real?

normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots launching beads dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> from her Astral Abacus.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to charge and unleash a continuous stream of Electro beads, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> every 0.2s that chains to up to 4 enemies.
charged.2: Nekara is free to move while using her charged attack, and has increased resistance to interruption.

plunging.1: Fires Electro beads at the ground, dealing <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> upon impact.

description.0: Nekara condenses immense energy from her Astral Abacus to create an explosion that deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> to enemies in front of her and creates a sigil with undefinable contents above her head.
description.1: The sigil grants her the Schrödinger Superposition Effect for 10 seconds.
description.4: When Nekara deals Normal or Charged-attack <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on her elemental mastery.
description.5: The sigil lasts for 10 seconds or after it is triggered a certain number of times. This effect expires when Nekara leaves the field.

description.0: Nekara summons a star-shaped Celestial Cyclone around her that deals a burst of <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to enemies as it expands. The field will linger and deal <electro>continuous AoE Electro DMG</electro> to enemies in its area every 1s.
description.1: While Celstial Cyclone is active, Nekara's elemental mastery will be increased by a percentage of her own elemental mastery.
description.2: Additionally, while Celestial Cyclone is active, Nekara enters the Stellar Statistics state, allowing her to switch between Multiplication, Addition and Subtraction modes on her Astral Abacus. She starts in the Multiplication state and can switch between the three modes by casting her burst again with no animation. Each mode has a different effect on the Celestial Cyclone and her attacks.
5: Multiplication: The star field remains the same size and deals moderate Electro DMG over time. Within Nekara's star field all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Electro. Normal and Charged attacks within the field hit the opponent will trigger a Star Sunder coordinated electro blast that deals AoE Electro DMG based on Nekara's elemental mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 1.5s

Addition: The star field expands and deals strong Electro DMG over time. Nekara's normal and charged attacks will also trigger a Supernova that deals AoE Electro DMG based on her elemental mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.75s

Subtraction: The star field contracts and deals weaker Electro DMG over time, but also afflicts enemies with the Less Than Three state, which reduces their resistance based on her elemental mastery. Nekara's normal and charged attacks also deal additional damage based on her elemental mastery in the Subtraction state.

description.0: Nekara's charged attack consumes 20% less stamina and charges 20% faster
While Celestial Cyclone is active, Nekara gains 5% bonus elemental mastery for each enemy hit by Parallax Paws over its entire duration, up to a maximum of 25%.
description.1: The same enemy can count multiple times for this passive.

description.0: At night (18:00 - 6:00), increases the optimize speed of your builds on Genshin Optimizer by 10%.
Nekara's normal and charged attacks have a 25% chance to deal double damage
When Nekara is under the Schrödinger Superposition Effect, every trigger that is a prime number doubles the damage increase from the Schrödinger Superposition Effect.
Increases the Level of Parallax Paws by 3.
When Nekara triggers an Electro reaction, she restores 4 Elemental Energy for herself and all nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the reaction.
Increases the Level of Illusory Heart by 3.

Every 1 charged attack DMG instance grants Nekara 1 stack of Golden Ratio. A stack can be gained every 0.2s. Nekara's Crit Rate and Crit DMG are increased by 3% and 5% per stack, respectively. Nekara can possess up to 8 stacks. All stacks share a timer and the stacks reset after 13 seconds.
